summary: The CDAiO course is designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of the roles and responsibilities of Chief Data, AI, and Analytics Officers. It covers a wide range of topics including data strategy, platform and architecture, cloud journey and security, data privacy and regulations, organizational data governance, data visualization, machine learning, and data monetization. The course includes 27 professional meetings and 2 enrichment sessions, with a focus on both physical and remote participation. Students are encouraged to engage actively to build connections and enhance learning. The course culminates in a final project that synthesizes the main learning topics, with collaboration opportunities with MIT's Chief Data Officer and Information Quality Symposium.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: CDO – CDAiO Course, Cohort 14.

COURSE OVERVIEW: The course serves as a meeting point between academia and industry, focusing on Chief Data Officers and Chief Data Ai & Analytics Officers.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: 
- Eran Shaham: Manager of the School of High-Tech and Cyber. Contact: 050-6560666, eran.shaham@biu.ac.il.
- Esther Agaev: Course Coordinator. Contact: 052-5886002, esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.
- Ido Biger: CDAiO Track Leader, EVP, CIO at Delek US, and CEO at DK. Formerly CDO at ELAL Israel Airlines and Head of Data at Yes.
- Lior Israeli: CDAiO Track Leader, Head of Data, AI & Analytics at Circles Ai. Formerly Manager of Data & AI Strategy at Deloitte.
- Oren Mizrahi: Lecturer in AI/ML, Data Science & CDO Operational Management, VP, Chief Data & Analytics Officer at Menora Mivtachim.
- Einat Shimoni: Lecturer in CDO, Data & AI Literacy, EVP Researcher of Technology Trends at STKI.
- Itay Hazan: Lecturer in Data Monetization, CFO at PayBox.
- Alon Schwartz: Lecturer in Digital Transformation and Data, Head of Data, Analytics, and AI at Proceed.
- Oren Harel: Lecturer in Data Governance Technologies, Data Management and Governance Consultancy at Aman.
- Tani Shapira: Attorney, Expert in Privacy Protection, DPO, HIPAA Auditor at MyEDPO.
- Hillel Koberovsky: Lecturer in Information Security and Career Management, Cyber Security Expert at Fortinet.
- Dor Eliav: Lecturer in Effective Presentation, Speech, and Public Speaking, Leadership and Personal Empowerment Expert.
- Oren Yeger: Lecturer in Transformation and Cloud Architecture, CISO, Security Expert.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Physical Learning Environment: Classes in Building 403 and 505, Safe Room in Building 404, Coffee Corner in Building 403, Cafeteria between Buildings 403 and 404, Vending Machines at entrances of Buildings 404 and 504.
- Parking: Paid parking around the campus, approximately 20₪ per evening. Permanent parking for the study period costs 300₪.
- Digital Learning Environment: Class WhatsApp group, permanent Zoom link, Drive with lecture recordings and materials, course student contact page, arrival map, WIFI settings in class, alumni group.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- 27 professional meetings and 2 enrichment meetings throughout the course.
- Professional meetings on Mondays and Thursdays from 17:30 to 21:30.
- Enrichment meetings on other weekdays as announced.
- Physical attendance is highly recommended for interaction and networking.
- Minimum physical attendance for a meeting is 3 students out of 9.
- Mandatory attendance in at least 80% of the classes.
- Remote participants must connect with identification and keep cameras on.
- Recordings available on Drive for 3 months post-course.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Data & Insights Driven Organization.
- The CDAiO Roles, Responsibilities, and Agenda Overview.
- Data Strategy Building Process, Management, and Measurement.
- Data Platform & Architecture.
- Cloud Journey and Security.
- Data Privacy & Regulations.
- Organizational Data Governance.
- The Data Analyst.
- Data Visualization & Storytelling.
- Data Science Life Cycle and Machine Learning.
- Data Science Operation Management.
- Data Governance Management Technologies.
- Generative AI Projects.
- Data Monetization.
- Executive Look at Modern Project Management with AI as Co-pilot.
- Data & AI Literacy.
- CDAiO Final Project & Summary Lecture.
- Career Management & LinkedIn Appearance.
- Building a Winning Presentation & Persuasive Speeches.
- Advanced Project Management aimed for Data Products.

CERTIFICATIONS AWARDED: Certification Program available.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: For registration, contact Esther Agaev at esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: Collaboration with MIT Chief Data Officer and Information Quality Symposium.
